title: Astroship
description: Astroship is a starter template for startups, marketing websites, landing pages & blogs.
fullDescription:
Modern tools

Astroship comes preconfigured with Astro, TailwindCSS, and Alpine.js for a modern developer experience out-of-the-box.

Responsive components

Donâ€™t spend hours reinventing the wheel!  Astroship comes with all the components you need to ship your marketing site fast.

  • Responsive navigation bar with dropdown menus
  • Features section with icons
  • Price comparison cards
  • Contact form

Page layouts

We have created a set of pre-built pages so you start with a fully functional site.

  • Home page with hero section
  • Pricing page
  • About page highlighting your team
  • Blog pages
  • Contact page preconfigured for Web3Forms
